Name: LOG the game
About the game: Angry timbers cut down a rare tree, one of logs rescued , and now he has to save his brothers to take revenge on the BIG BAD TIMBER . Fortunately, truck with brothers crushes half the way to the factory and brothers are waiting for Log to save them and to REVENGE! - UPGRADE your character! - BUY WEAPONS and SKINS! - Use different VEHICLES(cars, spacecracfts and even more)! - RECYCLE Log's brothers in LIVING THINGS! - Cool BOSSES! - A LOT OF different types of gameplay! - UNIQUE ATMOSPHERE&SHAKING SOUNDTRACKS! Music by RobotKSR, INSOMNIA. Oficcial group of the game - AGD.
